attributes.action: limit the proportion of Scottish born MPs representing English constituencies to the proportion of English born MPs representing Scottish ones
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There have been many petitions which seek to address the political imbalance between the two great nations, Scotland and England. This petition seeks to strike at the heart of that lack of equity.

Proportionately, there is an extremely high number of Scots who are active politicians in England; this is not matched north of the border, where to be an English candidate for a Scottish constituency will almost guarantee electoral disaster!
